title: Biden says private-sector COVID-19 vaccine mandate will take effect 'soon'
content:
1. Biden says private-sector COVID-19 vaccine mandate will take effect 'soon'  New York Post
  2. Biden says nation is 'headed in the right direction' on Covid but now is a 'very critical period'  CNN
  3. Live: Biden Delivers Remarks on Covid Response and Vaccines | NBC News  NBC News
  4. Biden says vaccine mandates shouldn't divide country, urges people to continue getting shots  Yahoo News
  5. Biden touts progress but warns US in 'critical period' as millions remain unvaccinated | TheHill  The Hill
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
